titleStmt.title: The Countess of Morton's daily exercise: or, A book of prayers, and rules how to spend the time in the service and pleasure of Almighty God.
titleStmt.author: Morton, Anne Douglas, Countess of, d. 1700.
Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Royston, bookseller to His most Sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Includes: "The last words of the reverend, pious, and learned Dr. Hammond" (G¹-¹² ), with individual dated title page.
Cataloged copy imperfect; lacking: B3-B10, C1, D1-D11.
Frontispiece = portrait of the Countess of Morton.
Copy imperfect, lacking: B3-B10, C1, D1-D11.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
